Title: Establishes the offense of defrauding an elderly person
Summary: Criminalizes defrauding a person 65 years of age or older by stealing or accessing without proper permission money, property or benefits by means of a deceptive tactic or the purposeful feeding of misinformation, regardless of the monetary value of the money, property or benefits.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the offense of defrauding an elderly person
